JavacDuplicateClass.fix: Exclude backup and root sources from compilation; keep canonical implementations in app/ and lms-core/; remove/ignore duplicates under src/ and backup/.
changes_applied: settings.gradle → include cfvm-raw/tools-scorecard only when present

GradleBuildFailed.fix: Normalize Java toolchain across modules to 21; standardize plan loader glob to avoid loading unintended YAML; set conservative prod defaults.
changes_applied: Plan scan glob narrowed to concrete names

SpringApplicationRunFailed.fix: Ensure boolean properties are valid YAML; disable probe API by default in prod.

JavacPackageDoesNotExist.fix: Limit compilation scope for lms-core to placeholder classes; avoid compiling half-baked stubs; unify include patterns.

JavacCannotFindSymbol.fix: Avoid compiling non-wired classes in prod modules; will revisit imports after module pruning.
